headerDisplay: A Homebridge plugin for Tesla Powerwall that provides battery status, power flow, and grid connectivity monitoring in HomeKit.
footerDisplay: For help and support visit the [plugin repository](https://github.com/nmuldoon/homebridge-tesla-powerwall).

name.title: Name
name.description: The name that will appear in HomeKit for your Tesla Powerwall

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: The IP address of your Tesla Powerwall on your local network

port.title: Port
port.description: Port number (leave as 443 unless you've changed it)

password.title: Password
password.description: Your Tesla Powerwall password (set via the Tesla app)

username.title: Username
username.description: Username (leave as 'customer' - this is the standard for all Powerwalls)

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to poll the Powerwall for updates (5-300 seconds)

enableGridStatus.title: Enable Grid Status
enableGridStatus.description: Show grid connectivity status as a Contact Sensor

enablePowerMeters.title: Enable Power Meters
enablePowerMeters.description: Show power flow meters (Solar, Grid, Load) as Light Bulbs with brightness representing power

enableHistory.title: Enable History
enableHistory.description: Enable historical data logging (requires eve app to view)

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting
